reviewText: Others are lying about these discs!  Mine are perfect and the manufacturer wouldn't produce so many "bad" copies of multiple volumes.

The disks are defective and won't play - everything is distorted and covered with a bright green splotch!!! This is absolutely unacceptable at this price. The site is "having trouble finding the order" but I managed to find the order number. There is no way to get a refund other than to go through this system that is not working correctly right now?  I don't want a refund, I want a replacement, because I want these episodes.

No video on the incredibly cheap looking discs, only sound. Sent back first copy and received a second with the same problem as the first. In the process of getting a third and I suspect it will have the same problem. For sixty dollars can you please send me something that works?!
